text: Sani achiegni gero hekalu ni Nying Jehova Nyasaye Nyasacha mondo achiwne kaka kar wang始o ubani mang始we ng始ar e nyime. Hekaluni nobed kama iketoe makati mowal e nyime pile, kendo kama ichiwoe misengini miwang始o pep mapile pile okinyi godhiambo. Misenginigi bende notim kinde Sabato kod ndalo ma dwe opor, kaachiel gi sewni moyier mag Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa. Ma en chik mochwere ni jo-Israel.
